    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    Board
    Interface representing the game board for Tetris.
    Brick
    Interface representing a Tetris brick (tetromino).
    BrickGenerator
    Interface for generating Tetris bricks.
    BrickRotator
    Manages the rotation state of a brick.
    ClearRow
    Immutable data class containing information about cleared rows.
    DownData
    Immutable data class containing information from a down movement event.
    EventSource
    Enumeration representing the source of a game event.
    EventType
    Enumeration representing the type of movement event.
    FileManager
    Manages file I/O operations for game data.
    FileManager.LevelData
    Data class to hold level information.
    GameController
    Main game controller that handles user input events and manages game logic.
    GameOverPanel
     
    GameOverPanel
    Game over panel UI component displayed when the game ends.
    GuiController
    GUI controller that manages the visual representation of the game.
    InputEventListener
    Interface for handling user input events in the game.
    LevelManager
    Manages game levels, including level selection, unlocking, and speed calculations.
    LevelsPanel
     
    LevelsPanel
    Levels selection panel UI component.
    Main
    Main entry point for the Tetris game application.
    MainMenuPanel
     
    MainMenuPanel
    Main menu panel UI component displaying game title and navigation buttons.
    MatrixOperations
    Utility class providing static methods for matrix operations used in the game.
    MoveEvent
    Immutable event class representing a game movement action.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data class containing information about the next rotation shape.
    NotificationPanel
     
    NotificationPanel
    Notification panel for displaying score bonuses and other temporary messages.
    PausePanel
     
    PausePanel
    Pause panel UI component displayed when the game is paused.
    RandomBrickGenerator
    Generates random Tetris bricks using a bag-based randomization system.
    Score
    Manages the game score with JavaFX property binding support.
    ScoreManager
    Manages game scores including current score and high score tracking.
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete implementation of the Board interface.
    ViewData
    Immutable data class containing view information for rendering.
